title: RESTORE-EE-Live-4.0.10-1
description:
RESTORE is a complete enterprise network backup and recovery solution. It is scalable to a complete backup solution for multiple workstations, servers and data centers. It operates over local area networks, wide area networks, and the Internet. See http://sourceforge.net/projects/restore/ for more information.  To download directly from sourceforge, go here: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=198657&package_id=251141

RESTORE-EE-Live-4.0.10-1.iso is a live CD specializing in creating an automated backup solution.  As featured on Lifehacker: http://lifehacker.com/362062/create-your-own-cross+platform-backup-server this torrent.  

This torrent contains the RETORE-EE iso and its md5.  It was created to take the strain off of the sf servers, and to improve the speed at which it may be downloaded.
